workouts.name: Bench Press
workouts.description: Lie flat on a bench and press the barbell upward until arms are fully extended, then lower it slowly.

workouts.name: Squats
workouts.description: Stand tall, lower your body by bending knees and hips, then return to standing.

workouts.name: Push-Ups
workouts.description: Keep your body straight, lower chest to floor, and push back up.

quotes: Pain is temporary. Strength is forever.
One rep at a time, one day at a time.
